description: Details required for Conditions 4 (Window Reveals, Door Reveals, Overhangs, Rainwater Goods), 7 (Cycle Parking), 8 (Fence Specification), 9 (Energy Efficiency),10 (Water Efficiency), 11 (Landscaping), 12 (Refuse and Recycling) and 13 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) of planning permission 20/00634/FUL (Sub-dividing site and erection of 2 x bedrooms 2 storey dwelling)
decision_conditions: The submitted details in relation to Condition 11 (Landscaping) are considered to be insufficient to ensure a satisfactory appearance of the development, contrary to Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

It has not been demonstrated that the location of the proposed cycle storage individually and cumulatively (combined with other proposed structures) would not result in cluttered appearance that would adversely impact the character and appearance of the host dwelling and the surrounding area and  contrary to Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
